Name: Delicious Raise the Roof
Desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. These exquisitely crafted candies seem to send a wave of coolness down your throat, relieving hoarseness like springwater bubbling over parched earth. Your voice is left sounding as clear as a newly-fledged hatchling, eager to spread its wings and fly up into the sky.
Effect: A little surprise from the Flower-Feather Clan.
